definitions.title: adj. gent.
definitions.body: (= mountain-dweller (Thes) ? or deriv. fr. some unknown

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: );—used only in defining certain of David's heroes:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: [[שַׁמָּה הַהֲרָרִי]] 2Sa 23:33 a (cf. Dr) = 1Ch 11:34 b (where rd. prob. [[שַׁמָּה]] for [[שָׁגֵה]], LXXL Samaia).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[שַׁמָּה בֶּן־אָגֵא הָרָרִי]] 2Sa 23:11 (rd. perh. [[הַהֲרָרִי]] cf. Dr; but LXX o( (Arouxai=ov, LXXL o( Araxi, i.e. [[הָאַרְכִּי]] ? Klo). On [[שַׁמּוֹת]] [[הַהֲרוֹרִי]] 1Ch 11:27 (LXX o( (Adi, LXXL o( Arwri) v. [[הֲרוֹרִי]] supr. p. 248.
[[אֲחִיאָם בֶּן־שָׁרָר הָארָרִי]] 2Sa 23:33 b (rd. prob. [[הַהֲרָרִי]]) = [[אֲחִיאָם בֶּן־שָׂכָר הַהֲרָרִי]] 1Ch 11:35.
